---
title: "Distance and Clustering Calculation Exercises"
output: html_document
---
Calculate the Manhattan distance for the object below.
$$
A =
\begin{bmatrix}
-3 & 2 & 4 \\
5 & -1 & 0
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Calculate the Euclidian distance for the Matrix below.
$$
B =
\begin{bmatrix}
2 & -4 & 5 & 3 & -1 & 0 \\
-2 & 1 & -3 & 4 & -5 & 2 \\
3 & -2 & 1 & -4 & 0 & -1 \\
4 & 0 & -5 & 2 & 3 & -2
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Calculate the Minkowski distance with a p value of 3.
$$
C =
\begin{bmatrix}
4 & -3 & 2 & -1 \\
-5 & 3 & 1 & 0 \\
2 & -2 & 4 & -4
\end{bmatrix}
$$

Complete the following:
Calculate the nearest neighbor distance between (1,2) and (4,5)

Calculate the furthest neighbor distance between (3,5) and (1,2,4)

Calculate the average neighbor distance between (1,3) and (2,4,5)

Complete a hierachical clustering process on the matrix below using single linkage clustering.
$$
D =
\begin{bmatrix}
0 & 2.1 & 3.5 & 4.2 & 5.1 \\
2.1 & 0 & 1.8 & 3.3 & 4.7 \\
3.5 & 1.8 & 0 & 2.5 & 4.0 \\
4.2 & 3.3 & 2.5 & 0 & 3.6 \\
5.1 & 4.7 & 4.0 & 3.6 & 0
\end{bmatrix}
$$
